block
	window 800210,yes,no
	window_yes item 661057>=1 && itemspace >=1
	killitem 661057,1
	giveitem (667991%10,667992%10,667993%10,667994%10,662101%5,607672%2,607673%2,607674%2,607675%1,607685%20,607680%30,600200%15,600400%15,600600%15,600800%15,601000%15,601200%15,18450%10,13677%10)
	endwindow 800210,ok
	window_no
